title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.19 - Confidentiality of reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.19 - Confidentiality of reports

State Regulations

Ombudsman reports and reports of the Independent Review Board
are confidential and shall be safeguarded from coming to the knowledge of, and
from inspection or examination by, any person other than the Director of the

Division for Youth, other designated agency officials for the performance of
their official duties, and the Independent Review Board. Authorized persons
receiving such reports shall not divulge information contained therein without
the written consent of the Director of the Division for

Youth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
177.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
